Texts.Eng: As long as you have enough Energy, and upon taking Elemental Damage, drain up to 45 Energy to gain 15 seconds of +25% Resistance against that element. Only one kind of Resistance can apply at any given time. Energy Cost lowers if the buff is already applied.
The Smith Station allows you upgrade weapons and craft melee weapons!
While Hunger is near satiated, you and nearby Players and NPCs gain increased Armor.
